title: Object-Based Support Framework for Reusing Learning Design Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Studies Learning Experience and Digital Tool Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Social studies education for office/administrative professionals, featuring project-based assessment in BYOD environments with simulation/VR learning settings

learning_goals: Learners understand the online lecture design process for social studies courses by 80% or more using learning design objects
Learners generate three types of educational scenarios (discussion/simulation/collaboration) by applying a learning design knowledge reuse framework
Learners develop and evaluate at least one VR simulation for analyzing real-world social phenomena through team-based projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
